System overview¶

The system presents data for the Great Lakes Coastal Wetlands using:

  • ESRI ArcGIS JavaScript for map display and spatial queries
  • ESRI GIS Server for data (spatial and tabular) storage and querying
  • Dojo and Dijit JavaScript libraries - ESRI’s choice of JavaScript / HTML widget layers.
  • CoffeeScript for authoring JavaScript
  • Sphinx and reStructuredText for documentation
  • Django the Python web application framework for managing user access levels, providing proxy access to resources (ESRI GIS Server etc.), and delivering supporting content
  • Mezzanine Content Management System (CMS) for user facing documentation and report delivery
  • git revision control, with hosting on GitHub
  • Apache for serving the Django web application using the WSGI interface.
